alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Wyandotte (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 10:54AM CDT until September 23 at 11:30AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Wyandotte County in northeastern Kansas... Northeastern Johnson County in east central Kansas... South central Clay County in west central Missouri... Western Jackson County in west central Missouri... * Until 1130 AM CDT. * At 1054 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Prairie Village, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kansas City, Overland Park, Olathe, Independence, Lee`s Summit, Shawnee, Blue Springs, Lenexa, Leawood, Raytown, Grandview, Prairie Village, Merriam, Mission, Edwardsville, North Kansas City, Fairway, Mission Hills, Sugar Creek and Westwood. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 1 and 17. Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 420 and 422. Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 0 and 4. Interstate 35 in Kansas between mile markers 220 and 235. Interstate 635 between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 470 between mile markers 0 and 16. Interstate 435 between mile markers 0 and 9, and between mile markers 56 and 83. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
